I am a data scientist at Bahlsen Group, Hannover, world-famous for Bahlsen and Leibniz cakes and biscuits. Before joining Bahlsen, I was a PostDoc at Leibniz University Hannover, focusing on empirical finance, especially time series analysis and panel data.  


My focus areas are:

* (Multivariate) time series
* Panel data
* High-frequency and sensor data
* Text mining
* Finance
